title: description
Rihanna's Monkey Island: An ill mix between the Monkey Island and the Admiral Cocktail. As high as Rihanna's pillow.

title: notes
Rihanna's Monkey Island: Khoosh, Bitters and a hint of swallow.

title: pairing
Rihanna's Monkey Island: Rihanna has it with an ill Chocolade and profiterole.

title: serving_suggestion
Rihanna's Monkey Island: Shake. Drink to the manonly sounds of Only Girl In The World.
